column1: git merge [remote]/[branch]: Merges changes from a remote branch into the current branch.
git push [remote] [branch]: Pushes committed changes to a remote branch.
git pull [remote] [branch]: Fetches and merges changes from a remote branch.
git cherry-pick [commit hash]: Applies the changes made in a specified commit to the current branch.
git rebase [branch]: Reapplies commits on top of another branch.
git clone --depth 1 [url]: Clones a remote repository with only the most recent commit.
git blame [filename]: Shows who made changes to a specified file.
git bisect: Helps identify which commit introduced a bug.
git submodule: Manages submodules in a repository.
git show-branch: Shows the branch structure of a repository.
git reflog: Lists all actions taken in a repository.
git archive: Creates a .tar or .zip archive of the repository.
